projects.title: Jedis
projects.subtitle: Redis-like Datastore made in Java
projects.description:
**Jedis** (Java Redis) is my attempt at replicating all features of [Redis](https://redis.io/) in Java.

[Source Code](https://github.com/Coralise/Java-Redis)

projects.title: Custom Bans Plus
projects.subtitle: Advanced Ban Management for Minecraft Servers
projects.description: **Custom Bans Plus** is a plugin for **Minecraft servers**, offering robust tools to manage bans and kicks effectively. Widely adopted with over **22,000 downloads**, it ensures customization and efficiency for server administrators.

projects.title: Mandog Driving
projects.subtitle: Driver's License Exam Reviewer (Japan)
projects.description:
An **online platform** built with **Flutter** and **Google Firebase**, designed to help users prepare for Japan's driver's license exam. It offers interactive tools and real-time feedback for effective learning.

Note: Gallery showcases dummy tests to protect actual exam content.

projects.title: MyStore
projects.subtitle: Sari-Sari (Local Convenience) Store Mobile Point-of-Sales Inventory System
projects.description: **MyStore** is a mobile **POS inventory system** for sari-sari store owners, using **Flutter** and **SQLite** for efficient management. It automates inventory processes with **OCR** for receipt scanning.

projects.title: UI Jobs
projects.subtitle: Minecraft Plugin
projects.description: **UI Jobs** redefines in-game economies for **Minecraft servers** by offering interactive jobs and anti-cheat measures. It creates an engaging and fair experience for players and server admins.
